main.name: Md. Al-Junaed Islam
main.description: I am a final year student in computer science interested in Web Development, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, and Data Science. Additionally, complete a web development internship at RiziqIT Solutions. I am passionate about working with full-stack development, software engineering and also fascinated with data analytics.
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.

education.school: Bir Shreshtha Munshi Abdur Rouf Public College

work.title: Web Developer Intern
work.description: Maintained websites for clients. Developed room booking system for Hotel Sea Alif. Upgraded RiziqIT's website.

work.title: Assistant Director of Creative Department
work.description: Lead a group of graphics designers for making posters, covers and videos for the various event of BUCC. Make promotional videos for events organized by BUCC.

featuredProjects.title: AJ IT Farm (Full Stack)
featuredProjects.description: This is a digital consultancy website. You can get Digital Marketing, Website Development and SEO support for your startup or business.

featuredProjects.title: AJ Book Club (Full Stack)
featuredProjects.description: This site is a book-buying website. You can order books here. Admin can add books to database and see them in list.

featuredProjects.title: AJ Transportation (React)
featuredProjects.description: A functional React website where you can have a transport service. You can find Bus, Car, Bike or Train service. Also, you can give your pickup and drop location.

featuredProjects.title: My Resume
featuredProjects.description: This resume is made with HTML and CSS. It is a responsive site too.

featuredProjects.title: Hotel Sea Alif
featuredProjects.description: This is a responsive room booking website for Hotel Sea Alif. You will get mail after you book.

featuredProjects.title: Emergency Medical Service
featuredProjects.description: This is a emergency medical service site. Here user can see nearest hospital from Google Map and request bike or ambulance.

allProjects.description: My first react app. In this site each player contains a price. There you can see your choosen players' name and price. Also you can see total price.

allProjects.title: Temperature API

featuredBlogs.title: A Glimpse of JavaScript’s String, Number and Arrays
featuredBlogs.description: JavaScript (js) is a dynamic client-side script language. It is also used on the server-side by Nodejs. Don’t get confused by thinking that Java and JavaScript are the same.....
